scenes.title: The Faded Threshold
scenes.text: Alex stepped into the abandoned school. Dust motes danced like forgotten promises. Swirling smoke curled from cracked tiles, veiling the corridor ahead. Silence pressed heavy, a predator waiting. A whisper echoed: 'Stay... learn with us.' Ghostly apparitions flickered at the edges of vision, spectral figures with hollow eyes. Danger lurked in the quiet, a blade unseen.

A faint voice murmured: 'Join the recess... forever.' Physical terror gripped Alex, the unseen edge drawing nearer.
